#1.note: Let's go invent tomorrow instead of worrying about what happened yesterday.
#1.author: — Steve Jobs

#2.note: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
#2.author: — Robert Frost

#3.note: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
#3.author: — Albert Einstein

#4.note: Smart people learn from their mistakes. But the real sharp ones learn from the mistakes of others.
#4.author: — Brandon Mull

#5.note: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never Win.
#5.author: — Ted Turner

#6.note: Everything is interesting if you go into it deeply enough.
#6.author: — Richard Feynman

#7.note: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
#7.author: — Abraham Lincoln

#8.note: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
#8.author: — Oscar Wilde

#9.note: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
#9.author: — Mae West

#10.note: If you live each day as it was your last, someday you'll most certainly be right.
#10.author: — Steve Jobs
